text: On 10 November 2014 a suicide bomber dressed as student killed at least 46 and injured many people at school assembly at the Potiskum, north-eastern town of Nigeria which was carried out by Boko Haram. ==References== Category:2014 murders in Nigeria Category:Mass murder in 2014 Category:Terrorist incidents in Nigeria in 2014 Category:Suicide bombings in Nigeria
title: 2014 Potiskum school bombing
